org.apache.hama.graph

Interface VertexOutputWriter<KEYOUT extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,VALUEOUT extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • Type Parameters:
    KEYOUT - the key output type.
    VALUEOUT - the value output type.
    V - the vertexID type.
    E - the edge value type.
    M - the vertex value type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultVertexOutputWriter

    public interface VertexOutputWriter<KEYOUT extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,VALUEOUT extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    The VertexOutputWriter defines what parts of the vertex shall be written to the output format.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setup(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Used to setup this output writer.
      void write(Vertex<V,E,M> vertex, BSPPeer<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT,GraphJobMessage> peer)
      Write is called for every vertex in the list.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        void setup(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Used to setup this output writer. This will be called right before the first call to write.

      • write

        void write(Vertex<V,E,M> vertex,
           BSPPeer<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT,GraphJobMessage> peer)
    throws IOException
        Write is called for every vertex in the list.
        Parameters:
        vertex - the user defined vertex.
        peer - the peer that has methods to write to the output sink.
        Throws:
        IOException
